doc.title: Neptune
doc.plot: Milk Machine Motion Pictures is pleased to bring you "Neptune", the groundbreaking feature by award-winning independent filmmaker Anthony Marchitiello. This post-apocalyptic nature film, set in a nightmarish future not too far off, is chilling look at a species on the verge of extinction...man. After the failure of civilization, the scattered remnants of humanity eke out a meager existence far from the cities, while the natural world thrives around them. A crate of souring milk sets in motion a cycle of treachery and violence, culminating in a vicious showdown. Filmed on location on the Northern Californian coast, Neptune is a work of meditative brutality, and mutant genius.
